actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description with respect to certain hand-woven fabrics.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description of woven fabrics of carded wool or carded fine animal hair. Changes the description of such fabrics that are handwoven by replacing certain sized looms with yarns of different colors.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description with respect to certain hand-woven fabrics.
